meaningMnemonic: A <radical>wing</radical> is something you <kanji>must not</kanji> do anything with. Wings are fragile (think bird's wings and butterfly's wings) and sometimes dangerous (like the wings of a plane) and you must not touch them, or even go near them! You MUST NOT. You. MUST. NOT.
readingMnemonic: Apart from staying away from wings, the other thing you <kanji>must not</kanji> do is eat <reading>mochi</reading> (もち). Okay, they're not fragile or dangerous, but I love mochi and I don't want you eating them.
